yellowBalloon.descriptionPattern.value: Yellow Balloon has a {0} charge, {1} more negative charges than positive ones.  Select WASD key to grab the balloon and start dragging. Select Tab for next item. Select question mark for keyboard help.

greenBalloon.descriptionPattern.value: Green Balloon has a {0} charge, {1} more negative charges than positive ones.  Select WASD key to grab the balloon and start dragging. Select Tab for next item. Select question mark for keyboard help.

screen.description.value: In the Play Area, there are one or two balloons, a sweater and a removable wall. Each object shows negative and positive charges. Charges are shown in pairs. Below the Play Area, a Control Panel allows you to add and remove objects, adjust charge views and reset the entire experiment. Currently, the sweater and wall have many pairs of charges, the balloon, just a few. Tab to navigate between objects. Select question mark for keyboard help.

screen.label.value: The scene for Balloons and Static Electricity

sweater.descriptionPattern.value: The sweater has a {0} charge, with {1} more positive charges than negative ones.

sweater.noMoreCharges.value: No more charges remaining on sweater

wall.chargeNeutralityDescription.value: The wall has a neutral charge, no more positive charges than negative ones.

wall.chargeDisplacementDescriptionPatter.value: Negative charges in the wall {0} balloon in a {1} arch.

resetBalloons.descriptionPattern.value: Select to {0} to initial position and an uncharged state.

keyboardHelp.WASDKeys.description.value: Use the WASD keys to grab and drag the balloon in four directions. Add the Shift key to the letter to make bigger steps.

keyboardHelp.WKey.description.value: W key drags up. Shift plus W drags up a lot.

keyboardHelp.tabBalloon.description.value: ‪Tabbing away from the balloon will release it.

keyboardHelp.quickMove.description.value: Use these key combinations to jump to a location in the Play Area.

keyboardHelp.JPlusS.description.value: J plus S jumps to edge of sweater.‬

keyboardHelp.JPlusN.description.value: ‪J plus N jumps to near wall.‬

keyboardHelp.JPlusM.description.value: ‪J plus M jumps to middle of Play Area.

keyboardHelp.tab.description.value: ‪Press Tab to go to next item.

keyboardHelp.shiftPlusTab.description.value: ‪Shift plus Tab to go to previous item.

keyboardHelp.questionMark.description.value: ‪‪Press Question Mark to opens keyboard commands and help.
